Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters of each depth of field quality level.

enabled.Wiki: If ON, depth of field is enabled.

forceHiResoBlur.Wiki: Changes the HiResolutionBlur setting (-1 is forced off, 0 is default, 1 is forced on)

maxBlurLevel.Wiki: Changes the maximum blur level. (2 is maximum, 1 is lower level by one, 0 is reduced accuracy
